alert.note: Alert for Crane; Ector; Midland; Upton; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 22 at 5:09PM CDT until April 22 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Ector County in western Texas... Southern Midland County in western Texas... Winkler County in western Texas... Crane County in western Texas... Upton County in western Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 508 PM CDT, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 18 miles southwest of Garden City to 14 miles northwest of Goldsmith, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 89 and 132. Locations impacted include... Midland, Odessa, Kermit, Crane, Wink, Goldsmith, Midland International Air and Space Port, West Odessa, Midkiff, Crane County Airport, Warfield, King Mountain, Skywest Airport, Odessa Schlemeyer Field, Notrees, Penwell, Winkler County Airport, Pleasant Farms and Monahans Sandhills State Park. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
